documents.document: excellent spent 7 nights with 2 rooms for our family of 4 including a 16 and 19 year old.Complimentary breakfast was convienent although same spread every morning ( breads, coffee cake, bananas, hard boiled eggs, ham, cheese, cereals) but filled us up each morning.Rooms were nice- I asked for the Bush street side based on other reviews- and the nights were quiet.Complimentary DVD rentals with a large list was a nice perk.Very friendly staff
